mapper.select: SELECT PRJOJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, EVA_CD, SCORE_FIN, EVA_START_DT, EVA_END_DT, DEL_YN, FRST_RGSR_ID, FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, LAST_CHNG_ID, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM FROM sch_incu.project

SELECT a.PROJECT_ID AS projectId, a.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, b.USER_GROUP_ID AS groupId, a.EVA_START_DT AS evastartDt, a.EVA_CD AS evaCd FROM sch_incu.project a LEFT JOIN sch_incu.project_detail b ON a.project_id = b.project_id WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.eva_start_dt DESC
